title: Client Onboarding - Initial Discovery
description: An account manager and technical lead conduct the initial discovery and kickoff meeting with a new managed services client.

tasks.description: Review the signed SOW to understand the agreed-upon services.
tasks.expected_outcome: The team is fully aware of the contract scope.

tasks.description: Conduct the kickoff meeting, introducing the team and walking through the onboarding process and timeline.
tasks.expected_outcome: The client understands the process and expectations are set.

tasks.description: Gather critical information from the client, such as existing administrator credentials, network diagrams, and a list of key vendors.
tasks.expected_outcome: The team collects the necessary information to begin the technical onboarding.
